alert.note: Alert for Issaquena; Sharkey (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 25 at 10:06PM CDT until June 26 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN MOREHOUSE...EAST CARROLL AND WEST CARROLL PARISHES...WESTERN YAZOO...ISSAQUENA AND SHARKEY COUNTIES... At 1006 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Yazoo City to near Cary to near Lake Providence, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Yazoo City around 1010 PM CDT. Valley Park and Alsatia around 1020 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
